foodtube videos when I can't even take tablets at the moment :(*

me ace my food tech GCSE back in 2010, but also what inspired me to train 
as a chef. Good times!﻿

comments.author: MsSpark111

comments.text:
I love Jamie interacting with the youtube community. Its a perfect way of 
showing how anyone can cook the recipes given. I do think the guests should 
have more of a role in cooking the food. I guess in the same way Ben from 
sorted food gets the others to do the cooking, but without stealing their 
ideas. 

Maybe it would be a good idea to consider having a collab with Sorted food 
with maybe a Masterchef theme or something. 

I think its a fabulous idea that you have got a range of chefs on this 
channel as well. Jamie likes to look after the little man lol.

I really enjoy being able to look on youtube for short good cooking clips, 
for recipes or entertainment. Personally I'd enjoy it more if you toke this 
channel a bit out of the box to the regular cooking shows on tv and really 
play on the youtube platform. But I get how that could be risky or unliked.

Anyways love all your stuff! Was in the mood to give away feedback lol﻿

before and I'm so curious! Happy st. Patrick's day! I have to check our 
drink tube and make that hot chocolate!﻿
